snippet: DeAndre Yedlin is receiving a lot of publicity after his encouraging performance in the United States’ 2-1 extra-time loss to Belgium on Tuesday in the World Cup’s Round of 16.
abstract: United States defender DeAndre Yedlin is receiving a lot of publicity after his encouraging performance in team's 2-1 extra-time loss to Belgium in World Cup Round of 16 soccer match.
lead_paragraph: DeAndre Yedlin is receiving a lot of publicity after his encouraging performance in the United States’ 2-1 extra-time loss to Belgium on Tuesday in the World Cup’s Round of 16.
